title: THURSDAY - Struggles in the Steel City 2020
itunes:title: THURSDAY - Struggles in the Steel City 2020
description:
The Steelers (0:09) look to regain their winning ways against the Colts as Ben Roethlisberger has an honest assessment of the team's play as of late (1:24). They're trying to hold off the Browns (1:54) who take on the Jets in Week 16. The Raiders get some good news about Derek Carr (3:17) as the Washington Football Team waits to see if Alex Smith will be back against the Panthers (3:52). Speaking of Washington, Dwayne Haskins (4:20) penalized by the team. Plus, the Texans continue their search for a new head coach (4:38)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
